summary: Feature request to simplify OpenTelemetry interceptor setup in TypeScript SDK by implementing it as a Plugin, allowing users to initialize OTEL with a single plugin object instead of manual configuration.
userImpact: Developers must currently use awkward OTEL interceptor setup when they should be able to use a simple plugin pattern.
proposedFix: Implement OpenTelemetryPlugin class that accepts configuration (resource, traceExporter) and can be passed to both Worker.create() and Client constructor via plugins array.
keyQuote: Setting up OTEL should be as easy as [plugin instantiation] const worker = await Worker.create({...plugins: [plugin]})
